item.title: Is third down performance a major factor in winning games?
item.description: When watching a football game, third downs are a time when energy is high throughout the stadium. Itâ€™s a pivotal moment in a game. Performance on third downs decides whether a team will punt it away, kick a field goal or keep driving down the field. But how much does converting on third downs contribute to wins? Does a team that converts more on third downs make a better team?
